item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 3)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 6)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 1)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 2)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 2)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 3)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Socialite (Level 4)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Author (Level 5)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.
